flavorText: A sliver shares everything with its hive—even its afflictions.

foreignData.flavorText: Ein Remasuri teilt alles mit seinem Schwarm selbst seine Leiden.
foreignData.name: Seuchenremasuri
foreignData.text: Alle Remasuris haben „Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments fügt dir diese Kreatur 1 Schadenspunkt zu."

foreignData.flavorText: Un fragmentado comparte todo con su colmena; incluso sus enfermedades.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado de la peste
foreignData.text: Todos los Fragmentados tienen "Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, esta criatura te hace 1 punto de daño".

foreignData.flavorText: Un slivoïde partage tout avec son essaim — même ses maladies.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde pestiféré
foreignData.text: Tous les slivoïdes ont « Au début de votre entretien, cette créature vous inflige 1 blessure. »

foreignData.flavorText: Un tramutante condivide tutto col suo alveare—perfino le sue piaghe.
foreignData.name: Tramutante della Peste
foreignData.text: Tutti i Tramutanti hanno "All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, questa creatura ti infligge 1 danno."

foreignData.flavorText: スリヴァーは群れとすべてを分かち合う――苦悩すらも。
foreignData.name: 疫病スリヴァー
foreignData.text: すべてのスリヴァーは「あなたのアップキープの開始時に、このクリーチャーはあなたに１点のダメージを与える。」の能力を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

foreignData.flavorText: Um fractius compartilha tudo com a sua colônia até mesmo suas aflições.
foreignData.name: Fractius da Praga
foreignData.text: Todos os Fractius têm "No início de sua manutenção, esta criatura causa 1 ponto de dano a você."

foreignData.flavorText: Щепки разделяют все с их роем даже их злоключения.
foreignData.name: Чумная Щепка
foreignData.text: Все Щепки обладают способностью "В начале вашего шага поддержки это существо наносит вам 1 повреждение."

foreignData.flavorText: 裂片妖与母巢分享一切～连苦恼也不例外。
foreignData.name: 疫病裂片妖
foreignData.text: 所有裂片妖具有「在你的维持开始时，此生物对你造成1点伤害。」

name: Plague Sliver
originalText: All Slivers have "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."

rulings.text: Each Sliver deals damage to its controller (not to Plague Sliver’s controller).

Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.

text: All Slivers have "At the beginning of your upkeep, this permanent deals 1 damage to you."
